Name: NeurOracle
Details: From the available rumors among Leh's population, the NeurOracle is an adapted neuro-helmet used by the Autocracy both to reveal the past and predict the future. There are indications that it may actually be two technological devices, one used to extract information during interrogations and the other one used as some sort of 'magic ball' used by the Autocracy's astrologers, to randomly generate auspices that give divine legitimacy to their decisions.
